alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Oneida; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 04 at 2:50AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Lincoln, Vilas and western Oneida Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 249 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Winchester to near Ogema. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Winchester around 255 AM CDT. Rice Creek Natural Area around 300 AM CDT. Border Lakes Natural Area around 305 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Tripoli, Willow Reservoir and Newbold. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
